23.ara-name: كتاب الجهاد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah: That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "The angels do no accompany a group among whom there is a dog or a bell." [Abu 'Eisa said:] There are narrations on this topic from Ibn 'Umar, Umm Habibah, and Umm Salamah. This Hadith is Hasan Sahih

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الأَجْرَاسِ عَلَى الْخَيْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Bells On Horses (Being Disliked)
